about_the_game:
MORTAL HIRE is a multiplayer horror game developed on Unreal Engine 5. Explore new planets and galaxies. Collect valuable rocks, metals, materials and trash of civilizations. Grilled chicken and krotovuha (mole tincture) are delicacies of your time. On 1000 planets, only a couple of collectors possess these juicy and delicious treasures. If you find them, don't hesitate! Either eat them, or collect them in your fridge, or sell them to a management company and get out of debt for good!

Meet quota and turn in found artifacts to the management company. Communicate with each other and be on your guard, as monsters may dwell around you!

The year is 3055. You - a lone traveler with many debts - have joined a company to explore new planets. You collect samples of valuable rocks, the remains of ancient civilizations. You also specialize in garbage collection. Explore new planets you will not be alone, but together with your new colleagues. All would be nothing, but the research company has conditions. You have to meet the quota of valuable metals, artifacts and rocks, but you can't imagine the consequences of not meeting the company's conditions. You thought the worst is over, but you are trapped by the conditions of the management company. You wanted adventure, you'll get it. Don't think that exploring the planets is a simple walk down the street. Beware of critters to get out of them alive.

Explore abandoned areas of the planets, unknown forests, seas and deserts in search of valuable materials for the company. Collect them and send them for sale to the management company. And always meet your resource collection quota!

Gather a squad of the best and go on a journey together. Keep in touch using the internal walkie-talkie and coordinate your actions. Each team member's life may depend on your decision. Help your team members not to get killed by monsters by giving directions and hints.

Use the microphone to interact with your team members.

Coordinate your team's actions and help them escape from scary monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100@ 3.6 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
